content.rendered:
Lake Avenue Elementary Clubs

  • Student Council
  • Fall Into Action Club
  • Foreign Language(s)
  • Beyond the Bell
  • Lego Club
  • Art Club
  • Science Fair
  • Garden Club
  • Spring into Action Club

Clubs and activities may vary depending on subscription, space availability and club sponsor. Please check our PTA newsletter and school message sent each week for sign-up information.
